Class ManagerInventoryController

java.lang.Object
com.group18.controller.manager.ManagerInventoryController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class ManagerInventoryController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
ManagerInventoryController is responsible for managing and displaying inventory data for a store manager. It provides functionalities such as viewing, filtering, searching, adding, and managing inventory items.
